Package org.consensusj.jsonrpc.cli

Class BaseJsonRpcTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.consensusj.jsonrpc.cli.BaseJsonRpcTool
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BitcoinCLITool, GenericJsonRpcTool

    public abstract class BaseJsonRpcTool
extends Object

    An abstract base class for JsonRpcClientTool that uses Apache Commons CLI

      • convertParam

        protected Object convertParam(String param)

        Convert a single param from a command-line option String to a type more appropriate for Jackson/JSON-RPC.

        Parameters:
        param - A string parameter to convert
        Returns:
        The input parameter, possibly converted to a different type
